info.title: CustomConnectorFramework
info.description: API for Amazon Q Business Custom Connector Framework

checkpoint_data.description: JSON serialized checkpoint data stored for the connector

connector_id.description: Identifier of the connector this checkpoint belongs to

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the connector was last updated

connector_id.description: Unique identifier for the connector following pattern cc-<11 character hex>

name.description: Name of the connector. Must contain only alphanumeric characters and hyphens.

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the connector was created

description.description: Optional description of the connector's purpose and functionality

arn.description: ARN of the connector following pattern arn:aws:ccf:region:account-id:custom-connector/cc-<id>

status.description: Current status of the connector. AVAILABLE indicates ready for jobs, IN_USE indicates a job is running

next_token.description: Pagination token for retrieving next set of results

errorType.description: Specific type of error that occurred in the Custom Connector Framework

message.description: Detailed error message describing what went wrong

memory.description: Memory allocation in MB for the container

cpu.description: CPU units for the container (1 CPU unit = 1024 CPU shares)

resource_requirements.description: Resource requirements for the container following ECS Fargate configurations

image_uri.description: ECR URI of the container image to be executed

execution_role_arn.description: ARN of the IAM role that the container will use for execution

job_role_arn.description: ARN of the IAM role that will be assumed by the container during execution

timeout.description: Maximum execution time in seconds for the container (7 days max)

name.description: Name of the custom connector. Must contain only alphanumeric characters and hyphens.

description.description: Optional description of the custom connectors purpose and functionality

environment.description: List of environment variables to pass to the connector job

name.description: Name of the environment variable. Must start with a letter and contain only alphanumeric characters and underscores

document_ids.description: List of document IDs to be deleted

documents.description: List of documents to be added or updated

checksum.description: Checksum of the document content for change detection

document_id.description: Unique identifier for the document within the connector

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the connector was last updated

memory.description: Memory allocation in MB for the container

cpu.description: CPU units for the container (1 CPU unit = 1024 CPU shares)

resource_requirements.description: Resource requirements for the container following ECS Fargate configurations

image_uri.description: ECR URI of the container image being executed

execution_role_arn.description: ARN of the IAM role that the container uses for execution

job_role_arn.description: ARN of the IAM role that the container assumes during execution

timeout.description: Maximum execution time in seconds for the container (7 days max)

connector_id.description: Unique identifier for the connector following pattern cc-<11 character hex>

name.description: Name of the connector. Must contain only alphanumeric characters and hyphens.

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the connector was created

description.description: Optional description of the connector's purpose and functionality

arn.description: ARN of the connector following pattern arn:aws:ccf:region:account-id:custom-connector/cc-<id>

status.description: Current status of the connector. AVAILABLE indicates ready for jobs, IN_USE indicates a job is running

job_id.description: Unique identifier for the job following pattern ccj-<12 character hex>

connector_id.description: Identifier of the connector this job belongs to

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the job was created

jobs.description: List of jobs for the connector

completed_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the job completed, if applicable

job_id.description: Unique identifier for the job following pattern ccj-<12 character hex>

connector_id.description: Identifier of the connector this job belongs to

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the job was created

failure_reason.description: Detailed reason for failure if job status is FAILED

next_token.description: Pagination token for retrieving next set of results

memory.description: Updated memory allocation in MB for the container

cpu.description: Updated CPU units for the container (1 CPU unit = 1024 CPU shares)

resource_requirements.description: Updated resource requirements for the container following ECS Fargate configurations

image_uri.description: Updated ECR URI of the container image to be executed

execution_role_arn.description: Updated ARN of the IAM role that the container will use for execution

job_role_arn.description: Updated ARN of the IAM role that will be assumed by the container during execution

timeout.description: Updated maximum execution time in seconds for the container (7 days max)

name.description: Updated name for the custom connector. Must contain only alphanumeric characters and hyphens.

description.description: Updated description of the custom connector's purpose and functionality

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the connector was last updated

connector_id.description: Unique identifier for the connector following pattern cc-<11 character hex>

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the connector was created

description.description: Optional description of the connector's purpose and functionality

arn.description: ARN of the connector following pattern arn:aws:ccf:region:account-id:custom-connector/cc-<id>

status.description: Current status of the connector. AVAILABLE indicates ready for jobs, IN_USE indicates a job is running

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the connector was last updated

connector_id.description: Unique identifier for the connector following pattern cc-<11 character hex>

name.description: Name of the connector. Must contain only alphanumeric characters and hyphens.

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the connector was created

description.description: Optional description of the connectors purpose and functionality

arn.description: ARN of the connector following pattern arn:aws:ccf:region:account-id:custom-connector/cc-<id>

status.description: Current status of the connector. AVAILABLE indicates ready for jobs, IN_USE indicates a job is running

documents.description: List of documents for the connector

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the document was last updated

checksum.description: Checksum of the document content for change detection

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the document was created

document_id.description: Unique identifier for the document within the connector

next_token.description: Pagination token for retrieving next set of results

checkpoint_data.description: JSON serialized checkpoint data to be stored for the connector
